A spontaneous organization, because Latin American filmmakers... are very united, although with few differences... aesthetical and ideological ones... as to the situation of each country, but they are united... in the common ideal to conquer... Latin American market and free it from the American occupation.

À cause d'un handicap professionnel... je n'ai pas la capacité de faire des documentaires. Je fais des films fictifs... liés à la réalité latino-américaine... avec un langage qui exprime les mythes... les plus profonds du peuple latino-américain... hérités de la culture noire et de celle indigène... des images, de l'imagination visuelle.

I, because of a professional deficiency... don't have the ability to make documentaries... so I make fictional films... connected to the Latin American reality... with a language that expresses the deepest myths... of Latin American people... inherited of the black culture and the Indian culture... of the images...
